citations.code: input.ts, lines 6-8: JSDoc comment states 'Must be between 1 and 5'; line 17: validation enforces 'if (retryCount < 1 || retryCount > 5)'

details.fix_summary: Documentation claims range is 0–10 but code enforces 1–5. Updated to match code validation.

citations.doc: readme.md, Configuration section, retryCount parameter: 'default is **1**'
citations.code: input.ts, line 7: JSDoc comment states 'Default is 3'; line 15: code uses 'const retryCount = options?.retryCount ?? 3'

details.fix_summary: Documentation claims default is 1 but code uses default of 3. Updated to match implementation.

details.actual_value: retryCount: 0 throws error 'retryCount must be between 1 and 5'

citations.doc: readme.md, Example section: Shows 'retryCount: 0' as valid usage
citations.code: input.ts, lines 17-19: Validation throws error when retryCount < 1

details.fix_summary: Example demonstrates invalid usage (retryCount: 0) that would cause runtime error. Updated to show valid value.
